name: BERMUDE
bio: Based in Toulouse, Milio Ruando is a DJ and producer who's spent years shaping his sound from a rich blend of techno, trance, and rave influences.

name: GRAVE
bio: Grave, the duo that smashes the boundaries between hard techno, gabber, frapcore, and musette waltz. A clash of brutality, wild distortion, and middle fingers in the air.

name: MARCEL DK
bio:
Marcel DK, a master of the decks with over 15 years of experience in electronic music, is a true sound alchemist, passionate about mixing and mastering.
In 2014, he joined the ultra-trendy collective Plein Phare, where he crafts his 'Marcelized' sets—a captivating techno that makes ravers vibrate.
Over the years, he has shared the stage with techno giants such as Charlotte de Witte, Amelie Lens, Jeff Mills, Pan-Pot, Boyz Noize, Mr. Oizo, Worakls, Perc, Marco Bailey, Paul Ritch, Déborah De Luca, Anne Clue, Reinier Zonneveld, Space 92, Popof, Marco Faraone... In 2024, Marcel DK makes a bold move with the release of his EP “Avantgarde” on the label Legends, enriched with remixes by Cosmics Boys and Teenage Mutant. But this is only the beginning: starting from November 2024, Plein Phare Records will unveil a series of new tracks, remixes, and a mini-album, already played by dozens of techno artists around the world. The long-awaited moment is approaching: Marcel DK will present his first live show on January 3, 2025, at the Bikini in Toulouse. With his unique blend of melancholic and powerful techno, Marcel DK is fully contributing to the energy and soul of the Toulouse techno scene.

name: MILIO RUANDO
bio:
Milio Ruando is a French DJ, a figurehead of Toulouse's electro scene (France), renowned for his quest for raw, hard-hitting techno.Capable of delivering high-intensity sets, Milio tells his own story behind the decks.

His fluid transitions between trance, hard, techno and acid captivate audiences, keeping dance floors in tension with unexpected musical turns.

He has shared line-ups with legends such as Jeff Mills, Space 92, Sam Paganini, Kölsch, Reinier Zonneveld, Floorplan, Massano, reinforcing his reputation as a versatile and reliable artist.

Co-founder of the Plein Phare collective, Emilien Jouando, his real name, has helped unite thousands of fans in Toulouse and beyond. Known for its community spirit and events, Plein Phare embodies Milio Ruando's devotion to authenticity in the electronic scene.

In 2024, Milio begins a new step with a peak-time techno EP that promises to establish him as a rising force on the international scene.His sporting past and his passion for cycling in his native countryside lead him to open this new musical chapter : “Ride with me”.
This EP is an invitation to follow him, discover his rich universe and share his values and music with him. In collaboration with artists such as Frankyeffe, he channels his passion into tracks that reflect his taste for risk-taking.

Ready to leave his mark far beyond France, Milio is an artist driven by raw talent and an uncompromising commitment to his art.
